svg.text: Government and Organizational Pathways for Golden Triangle Peace Mechanisms
• Legislative authorization for 3/4 and 2/3 majority voting
• FPIC 2.0 consent protocols in national law
• Earth Council consultation in policy development
• UNSC veto override ratified by 25+ nations
• Indigenous sovereignty legislation passed in 15+ countries
• Earth Council consultation protocols active in 50+ policies
• Peace Meta-Council coordinating 5+ crisis responses annually
• Global Citizens' Initiative used for 5+ peace decisions
• Lead Treaty ratification and Indigenous consultation processes
• Integrate Earth Council guidance into policy development
• Provide Traditional Knowledge guidance and consent protocols
• Lead bioregional governance development and ceremonial integration
• Build public support for Treaty mechanisms and Indigenous sovereignty
• Participate in Meta-Governance coordination and democratic accountability
Phase 1-2 (Years 1-3): Legislative foundation + institutional capacity building with Indigenous partnership development
Phase 3-4 (Years 4-10): Operational deployment + transformational evolution guided by Earth Council authority
Prerequisites: Indigenous consultation, Treaty education, Meta-Governance network participation, democratic coalition building
